desc: The Secret of The Surrey Hills. Hurt Liqueur has been hand crafted to partner with all types of sparkling wine, whether your preference is Champagne, Cava, or Prosecco, and particularly well with English sparkling wines. Hurt Liqueur also makes a mean pink gin! Try our range of easy cocktail recipes.

layout.text: Blended to use with all Sparkling Wines, Gins & Vodkas.
Treat yourself to a bottle today!
